orego.core

Class Colors

  • java.lang.Object
    • orego.core.Colors

  • public class Colors
extends Object
    Colors of points.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BLACK
      Black, equal to 0.
      static int NUMBER_OF_COLORS
      Number of colors, including VACANT and OFF_BOARD.
      static int NUMBER_OF_PLAYER_COLORS
      Number of player colors, equal to 2.
      static int OFF_BOARD_COLOR
      Off board, equal to 3.
      static int VACANT
      Vacant, equal to 2.
      static int WHITE
      White, equal to 1.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Colors

    • Method Detail

      • charToColor

        public static final int charToColor(char ch)
        Returns the color represented by ch.

      • colorToChar

        public static final char colorToChar(int color)
        Returns a char representing color. Used for board diagrams.

      • colorToString

        public static final String colorToString(int color)
        Returns a String representation of color. The result is the same as that from colorToChar, but it's been converted to a String.

      • isAPlayerColor

        public static final boolean isAPlayerColor(int color)
        Returns true if color is either BLACK or WHITE.

      • opposite

        public static final int opposite(int color)
        Returns the opposite of color. Undefined if color is not BLACK or WHITE.

      • spellOutColorName

        public static String spellOutColorName(int color)
        Takes an int and returns the corresponding color as a string.
